title: Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson dress down for couple coffee date in LA
text:
Miley and Cody have been dating for the past few weeks (Picture: NEMO / BACKGRID)

Miley Cyrus and Cody Simpson have been casually dating since the former split from her Hollywood husband Liam Hemsworth.

So fittingly, the pair have been photographed on the embodiment of the casual date – a coffee shop stop.

Mother’s Daughter singer Miley wore a white t shirt with jeans and heels for the outing, while Cody wore a black t shirt with block jeans and boots.

Like Miley, Cody is also a singer who scored a top 10 US album in 2010 with Surfers Paradise.

In a rare public statement, Matt Zeidman, Miley’s manager, recently addressed the fact the pair have been hanging out.

‘It is early, but their friendship is long-standing and deeper than people realise,’ said Zeidman.

Miley and Cody looks pretty comfortable in each other’s company on the coffee run (Picture: BACKGRID)

‘Though they originally met during their own wilder phases, they’re both sober now and are focused on health, work and spending time together. Seems pretty ideal to me.’

Their blossoming relationship follows Perfect singer Cody’s many admiring comments about Miley in interviews over the years.

Cody Simpson’s mother shared this pic of her son and Miley (Picture: Angie Simpson/Instagram)

He has previously confessed that Miley was his ‘childhood celebrity crush’ and ‘will be, forever, the most dateable Disney star.’ He also admitted he ‘knew all the words to her songs’ and ‘was not ashamed about it at all’.

We couldn’t agree more, and we’re glad to see Miley happy after the breakdown of her marriage in August.

Cody’s mum Angie has also commented on the relationship, saying on Instagram: ‘Puts a smile on my dial to see you both so blissfully happy.’

‘Hearing your laughs and seeing the smiles on your faces lights up my heart #happyforyouguys #beautifullsouls @codysimpson @mileycyrus’.

Miley’s mum, Tish, then commented: ‘Puts a smile on my face too @angiemsimpson love you my sweet friend’.
